definition: to pay attention to/to follow sth closely/to follow (on social media)/concern/interest/attention
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
surname Guan
to inject/to pour into/to concentrate/to pay attention/stake (gambling)/classifier for sums of money/variant of 註|注[zhu4]

sentences.english: Considerable attention is given to the action of centrifugal force in grinding wheels.
sentences.chinese: 磨牀砂輪的離心力作用受到相當的關注。

sentences.english: The Chinese government has demanded that U.S.-led NATO bear all responsibilities for this incident, and the Chinese side will continue to pay close attention to the development of the matter.
sentences.chinese: 中方將繼續密切關注情況的發展。

sentences.english: The question is whether the dedicated have had more influence than the image- flashers .
sentences.chinese: 問題是無論如何對閱讀的這種關注比圖片根由影響。

sentences.english: Look for scratching or fiddling with clothing.
sentences.chinese: 關注抓撓或撥弄衣服的動作。

sentences.english: There is no solution to the question of climate change without forestry.
sentences.chinese: 如果不關注森林，那麼氣候變化問題就是無法解決的。

sentences.english: Liverpool, meanwhile, are monitoring the young Preston North End midfielder Adam Barton.
sentences.chinese: 利物浦對普瑞斯頓的中場巴頓密切關注中。

sentences.english: Pod transport technology is even starting gain some stateside attention.
sentences.chinese: 豆莢車運輸技術甚至引起了美國的關注。

sentences.english: They looked at long-term sick leave (of over 90 days) and hospital admission rates.
sentences.chinese: 他們關注的重點是超過90天的長時間病假和住院率。

sentences.english: They should also be constantly concerned in taking care and cleaning their stoma .
sentences.chinese: 他們還應該不斷關注，在照顧和清潔他們的氣孔。

sentences.english: He says these incidents gained a lot of attention seven or eight years ago.
sentences.chinese: 他說，這些事件七八年前得到了大量的關注。

sentences.english: Diffenbaugh and Ashfaq focus specifically on heat waves over the United States.
sentences.chinese: 迪芬巴夫和阿什法克的研究特別關注美國的熱浪。

sentences.english: Brennan said it has long been an area of concern.
sentences.chinese: 布倫南說，也門早已成爲引人關注的地區。

sentences.english: The Industrial cluster is a topic popularily concerned in the academic world either in our country or abroad in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 產業集羣是近年來國內外學術界關注的一個熱點話題。

sentences.english: Why don't we just accept it for what it often is--the other person's genuine concern and desire to help?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼不願接受別人的真誠關注和幫助？

sentences.english: Finally, delegating logic often leads to a cleaner separation of concerns.
sentences.chinese: 最後，委派邏輯通常會得到更乾淨的關注點分離。

sentences.english: Or with Mr. Jobs, if Apple had remained just Apple Computer?
sentences.chinese: 如果蘋果只是蘋果電腦，人們還會如此關注喬布斯嗎？
